component.name: stable-diffusion
component.description: Stable Diffusion is a latent text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input. For more information about how Stable Diffusion functions, please have a look at ðŸ¤—'s Stable Diffusion with ðŸ§¨Diffusers blog.

performanceMetric.value: The value of the performance metric
performanceMetric.slice: The name of the slice this metric was computed on. By default, assume this metric is not sliced

confidenceInterval.lowerBound: The lower bound of the confidence interval
confidenceInterval.upperBound: The upper bound of the confidence interval

graphic.name: FID vs CLIP Scores on 512x512 samples for different v1-versions

users.user: Who are the intended users of the model?

useCases.useCase: Who are the intended users of the model?

technicalLimitations.technicalLimitation: What are the known technical limitations of the model?

performanceTradeoffs.performanceTradeoff: What are the known tradeoffs in accuracy/performance of the model?

ethicalConsideration.name: The name of the risk
ethicalConsideration.mitigationStrategy: Strategy used to address this risk

fairnessAssessment.groupAtRisk: The groups or individuals at risk of being systematically disadvantaged by the model
fairnessAssessment.benefits: Expected benefits to the identified groups
fairnessAssessment.harms: Expected harms to the identified groups
fairnessAssessment.mitigationStrategy: With respect to the benefits and harms outlined, please describe any mitigation strategy implemented.
